alert.note: Alert for Erath (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 05 at 6:21PM CDT until May 05 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM CDT FOR ERATH COUNTY... At 621 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dublin, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...65 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Stephenville, Dublin, Huckabay, Bluff Dale, Morgan Mill, Purves, Harbin, Alexander, Clairette, Lingleville, Duffau, Edna Hill, Bunyan, Johnsville, Selden, Chalk Mountain and Highland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately.
